name: Moreau
description:
“Shipwrecked. A funny, old-fashioned word, but that’s what happened to me…”

You are Eddie Pendrick, marooned on what you think should be a deserted island - until you encounter the natives. Their master wants you for his experiments, but one creature by the name of M’Ling dares to rescue you. Can you survive the hordes the doctor throws at you? Or will you succumb to becoming his inevitable final experiment?

This game will test your wits and fortitude as you try to escape through iconic locations inspired by the classic H.G. Wells novel “The Island of Doctor Moreau”. Follow M’Ling as he guides you through the jungles of the island, but beware! Moreau and his assistant are willing to give up everything to keep you alive for his studies in creating the ultimate creature…

One part 'Altered Beast', one part 'Metamorphic Force', one part vintage sci-fi/horror classic, 'Moreau' presents a weird, fresh take on the 2D beat-em-up.

Features:
  • Choice of male or female protagonist
  • Player transformations
  • Vector-style graphics
  • Controller support
  • Original soundtrack
  • Multiple endings
  • Lots of punching
